title: Black Eye Bean Cakes
ingredients: ['225g streaky bacon', '725g tinned black-eye beans, rinsed and drained', '2 tablespoons minced shallot', '5 tablespoons chopped roasted red peppers', '3 tablespoons plain flour, or as needed', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
